original_text: They also took care of the poles that held the cloth round the yard, their ropes and other things that held the Tent in its place.
korean_text: 뜰 사방 기둥과 그 받침과 그 말뚝과 그 줄들이니라

sentences.original_text: They also took care of the poles
that held the cloth round the yard
that held the Tent in its place
